title: New Super Galaxy Skin availiblity
body: Why do the new Super Galaxy skins for {{champion:102}}  {{champion:203}} {{champion:105}}  say unavailable?

replies.body: We are going to launch them during the patch, but we have no firm ETA yet when they are going to be released.  The best advice I can give is to sit tight and keep checking the store!

Dear dArtagnan I am trying to get Riot's attention to a matter pertaining to the new super galaxy skins posted in this LoL forum: 

http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-feedback/EOGVQHnj-super-galaxy-fizz-taunt-1-suggestion 

is there any way you could give your 2 cents to the correct people or forward it to them? The basic idea is that on fizz's taunt 1 the fish despawns into his helmet and he makes the eating noise, I suggest that the glass screen on his helmet open up for the taunt and close as the taunt ends so the fish can land in his mouth and not look awkward.
they not gonna do it otherwise it's 1820 RP
